name: Save new Livestorm registrants to rows in Google Sheets spreadsheets
description: Every time a new registration is created in Livestorm, Make will automatically add registration information to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TOYeUzO1Hhd_m_9fQkfsvZr1L1dIVWl4GwUCugv6nMg/edit?usp=sharing)
